author: Paul Kasabian
title: Damian Lillard Talks NBA Hiatus, Upcoming Mixtape, More with Ernie Johnson
description: Portland Trail Blazers point guard Damian Lillard spoke with Turner Sports' Ernie Johnson via video call on  Wednesday and covered a host of topics...
content:
Sam Forencich/Getty Images
Portland Trail Blazers point guard Damian Lillard spoke with Turner Sports' Ernie Johnson via video call on  Wednesday and covered a host of topics.
NBA@NBA#NBATogether with Ernie Johnson starts now!
Tune in as @TurnerSportsEJ is… [+5550 chars]
